summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackEvery daily dose of the NUDESTIX Nudeskin Hydrating Peptide Lip Butter helps lips feel soft and juicy, and look plump and contoured - all while tasting fresh and yummy. Ripe avocado and shea butters melt to instantly soften the lip texture and lock in moisture for all day hydration.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsAvocado Butter: Juicy avocado butter nourishes to leave your lip skin soft, supple & hydratedShea Butter: Rich shea butter is a lipid-rich emollient, loaded with multi-vitamins A & E, that melts over lips to soften dry, soothe chapped, and protects lipsPeptides: Use 2X daily to increase hyaluronic acid by +101% to lock in juicy moisture by over +50%Formulated WithoutSulfatesPhthalatesParabensGlutenSynthetic fragrancesItem 2580964How To UseApply morning and night for 2X per day and as required throughout the day.IngredientsClear: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Octyldodecanol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Butter, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Vanillin, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Tribehenin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Portulaca Pilosa Extract, Sucrose Cocoate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, *Limonene, *Linalool.*Naturally Occurring In Essential Oils Listed.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply morning and night for 2X per day and as required throughout the day.

reviews.headline: Peppermint oil
reviews.comments: I cant stand the smell of peppermint and i didnt realize this had it in there. Ive used other Nudeskin products and loved them, so i skipped reading the reviews. It is more then a little minty, but that could be because of my sensitivity to it. Its also very tingling. If these things dont bother you, give it a try.

reviews.headline: Peppermint oil
reviews.comments: Did not rralize this had peppermint oil when i bought it. String smell. Wioed off as much as i could as quickly as possible but its lingering.

reviews.headline: Will Repurchase
reviews.comments: Became one of my favorite lip butters.

reviews.headline: On my 4th tube
reviews.comments: I love love looove a invigorating minty lip product and this is it!! I see the comments saying they are returning because of the mint but if they were to take it out, i wouldnt buy it, for someone who looks for mint in lip products this is a selling point and im so glad i tried this one!! So if youre a mint girly definitely try this one!

reviews.headline: A staple
reviews.comments: I did not expect to like this product so much! I am not a lip gloss girl, I find it sticky and useless against my always chapped lips. This gloss feels AMAZING on. I love peppermint, and the slight tingle it gives just feels refreshing! I will definitely buy more and try other colors too!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: This is by far my favorite go to lip product. You only need to use it once or a couple times a day. I work at a barn, and ride horses in the dead of winter- and this stuff keeps my chapped lips so so hydrated. Its so moisturizing without a heavy or sticky feeling on the lips. I always get it in clear but it seems like a very buildable consistency. I love how you can actually feel the peptides working to plump and nourish the lips as well woth little tingles at first. Although I wish it came in a different scent to be honest, but I have gotten compliments from some of my sorority sisters saying I smell fresh and minty whenever I wear it. I just wish they had more colors and scents or an unscented clear one and maybe a more minimalist packaging soley for aesthetic purposes. But other than that I genuinely love this product even more so than my kylie gloss, rhode peptide lip tints, and glossier products which I also all love as well.

reviews.headline: Best lip butter
reviews.comments: My lips were extremely chapped and not healing.  Within a day or two after using this product, my lips were completely healed and hydrated.  Best product that I use day and night. I will keep repurchasing!

reviews.headline: Hoping for a winner üò©
reviews.comments: This tastes AWFUL üòñ I liked the color, ingredient's, & was lookinh for a moisturizing lip gloss. However, I can't get past the taste. Immediately washed it off, & will be returning. Sadly‚Ä¶

reviews.headline: The peppermint oil in it is overpowering
reviews.comments: I'm so disappointed by this Lip Butter, after reading the high reviews.

reviews.headline: Hydrating and good shine but‚Ä¶
reviews.comments: The caramel smell is so strong and overbearing in my opinion. Too strong for me to wear. Will be returning. Also got the "candy kiss" LOVE IT!

reviews.headline: bury me with this
reviews.comments:
ive used this lip balm for about a year now and i dont need any other lip product day-to-day. i have every single color, with backups, and ranked it is the berry, then vanilla, then caramel. 

pros: not sticky, plumps naturally, good score on Yuka, gorgeous color, hard to overapply

cons: i keep the tube a month after its "empty" to squeeze out the extra product i must use every drop of gold. (also caramel smell is no bueno, but color is gorgeous)

reviews.headline: Gave me my lip color back
reviews.comments: As an older lady, our lips tend to get thinner abd lose color. I started using NudeStix every morning and every night and after a month I saw that the natural color had returned to my lips! And my lips are soft and slightly plumper. Theyre not kardashian huge but I'm so happy to see an improvement. Ill definitely keep using NudeStix Lip Butter. This is not a paid review‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Okay product
reviews.comments:
I like the way it makes my lips feel upon application. It does has a mint feel but no taste that I could tell. 
This didn't last long before I had to reapply. Obviously if you eat or drink anything, most comes off. But I noticed that after about an hour, I had to reapply even without eating or drinking. If your lips get chapped often like mine do, try Olehenriksen instead.

reviews.headline: Love the product, hate the packaging
reviews.comments: Maybe I've got a dud, but every time I remove the cap a huge gob of product comes out. I've probably lost half the tube because so much come out that I can't use it all and I won't repurchase for this reason. Wonderful lip balm though!

reviews.headline: I would buy this over and over again!
reviews.comments: THUS IS SO HYDRATING AND SMELLS SO GOOD I LOVE IT ü©∑

reviews.headline: Fab gloss
reviews.comments: I too got this in my Fab Fit Fun box and just love it, hydrating and plumping and sweet scent. So happy to see Ulta carries so I can re stock!

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I got this in my Fab, Fit, Fun box and am now obsessed.  I love the smell, the feeling and the shine of it. I am buying tubes as gifts for others now as well.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I love this lip balm. I own a bunch from different brands and this one takes the cake. I wonder if the other colors are sold out at Ulta or just not sold here at all. If the latter, please get the other colors!!

reviews.headline: Burns
reviews.comments: Not for me, made my lips burn. Terrible application, couldn't control the product as it's too thin.

reviews.headline: loveee this lip butter!!
reviews.comments: sooo good and hydrating and the lil minty hint is awakening and soothing!! 100/10 recommend!!

media.headline: An everyday must have!
media.caption:
Makeup and skincare is my jam!  So when the opportunity comes up to try something new count me in! This time I had the opportunity to try the Hydra-Peptide Lip Butter from @nudestix through a @bzzagent campaign. Even though the product was at no charge I still want to provide my honest opinion because ethically I can't put my name on something I don't agree with. This hydrating lip butter has a minty/tingly sensation and provides so much hydration. Perfect for the Summer when you want something quick and easy for day to day wear.

#makeupjunkie #cosmetictester #momlife #makeupartist #makeup

faceoff_positive.comments:
I was so excited to try the Hydra-Peptide Lip Butter from Nudestix. First, I have been so curious about peptide lip products due to a lot of hype on social media and a lot of celebrity skin care lines. I am so happy to try this from Nudeskin, the skincare line from Nudestix because I love and cover their makeup products and love how gentle and non-irritating their products are. When it comes to lip products I want something that's not harsh because I don't want to break out into a rash around my lips or anything. I love that this lip butter has avocado and shes which are ingredients I look out for as they are natural. 

My lips were a lot smoother and this is more than just a "lip balm". I call this a lip treatment; while I have used it plenty during the day my favourite time to use it is overnight to really help repair my lips which can get dry and chapped with all the heating indoors during winter. I love the gentle applicator and for the perfect amount comes out with the squeeze tube. It is so hydrating and my lips wake up feeling baby smooth. I got this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I would and already have suggested this to my friends because the price is affordable and contains similar peptides to some higher end products that are a bit too steep in price. This lip butter was so luxurious I consider it on part with comparable higher end lip butters.
faceoff_positive.headline: New holt grail lip treatment

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was genuinely perplexed that so many other reviews gush that this lip gloss isn't sticky and feels good, because honestly, it is actually very sticky, gooey/goopy, heavy and unpleasant feeling on my lips. Additionally, the smell / taste was another signifigant downside/disappointment of this lip gloss for me as well. The "mint" taste/odor wasn't enjoyable, and didn't feel good on my lips. There certainly wasn't any lip plumping effect, nor did I ever find it to be moisturizing or softening on my lips. It just doesn't taste good, which is a pretty big deal for me when choosing lip products. It doesn't make lips plump, soft, supple, or feel nice, light or clean. If I really wanted super shiny lips, I would never even consider spending over $22 for this really underwhelming clear lip gloss. I would just buy one of the countless clear super shiny lip glosses that look, feel, taste, and smell significantly better in every way than this one, and will only cost me around $5. 

I gave this product two stars rather than one is because I didn't hate it, I just really didn't like anything about it.
faceoff_negative.headline: A mediocre clear lip gloss for a high end price tag
